name: Sugar Mama
description: A hybrid of two well-known indicas, Sugar Mama is praised for her over-sized colas and sugary flavors. The aroma of this Big Bud/Blueberry cross has notes of skunky maple syrup and hash. The calming indica effects are an enjoyable way to curb nausea and migraines.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Aroused, Stress, Depression, Pain, Insomnia, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
